td.content: s:a female aged 66 ys says she is having symptoms of Mental Health 8 x week, mostly during the day. denies any smoking she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 64 in, Weight 111 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.

s:pt says she is having symptoms of Mental Health 19-20 times a week, in spite of treatment. she is a white f retired aged 67 years. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 64 in, Weight 109 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 17 a:Schizophrenia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed risperidone - 1 mg 2 x day, and ordered Mental Status exam.
